TextLibrary.Text: Khrona
We need to stop the Ogres in the south, but I need your advice on how to do it.

There is a city of Ogres called Gluk, south past the village of Gork where you traveled before.

Do they have a leader there?
Do they have a leader there?
Do they have a leader there?
Do they have a leader there?
They are ruled by an Ogre Mage. I do not know his name. But if you strike against him, then they will fall back into chaos. Not even Gruulkar will be able to organize them.
